sentences.sContent: a pot of soup simmering on the stove
sentences.sCn: 在炉灶上煨着的一锅汤

sentences.sContent: ...A recent Harris poll revealed that 79% of Americans say they enjoy cooking and 30% "love it" ; 14% admit to not enjoying kitchen work and just 7% won't go near the stove at all...

trans.tranOther: a piece of kitchen equipment on which you cook food in pots and pans, and that contains an oven
